name: enumeration.js
description: Java-like super flexible enums ! Move the logic.
author: Jules Randolph <jules.randolph@usherbrooke.ca>

scripts.generate: coffee --compile --bare -p src/Enumeration.coffee | uglifyjs > publish/Enumeration.min.js && coffee --compile --bare -p src/Enumeration.coffee |  browserify - --standalone Enumeration > publish/Enumeration.bd.js && coffee --compile --bare -p src/Enumeration.coffee |  browserify - --standalone Enumeration | uglifyjs > publish/Enumeration.bd.min.js && coffee --compile --bare -p src/Enumeration.coffee > publish/Enumeration.js
